item.title: Test Mathjax
item.description: This is the first $\sqrt{3x-1}+(1+x)^2$ some line in between $$ \left{ \begin{align} \dot{x} & = \sigma(y-x) \newline \dot{y} & = \rho x - y - xz \newline \dot{z} & = -\beta z + xy \end{align} \right. $$
item.content:
This is the first

some line in between
